name: Akshat Sehgal
desc: Junior @ MHHS, Programmer/Dev, Music Producer, 3D Artist, Video Editor, Photographer, Boy Scout, and Robotics enthusiast. Been to 15+ hackathons and won tons of prizes. Officer of Hackathon, Circuitry, and Robotics Club, and part of VEX robotics. Excited to be lead of MountainHacks 2024!

name: Yashmit Bhaverisetti
desc: Junior @ MHHS. Passionate Programmer experienced in many coding languages. Ardent in Robotics, Photography, Circuitry, Digital Art, and Scouts. Part of a VEX & FTC team. Won over half of the 15+ hackathons competed in.

name: Dhruv Jena
desc: Junior @ MHHS. Fervent software engineer dedicated on learning radical ways to approach modern problems. Apart from Hackathon club, hobbies such as Tennis, Chess, and STEM spark my interest. Driven to host the best Mountain Hacks yet!

name: Ritvick Raghuvanshi
desc: Junior @MHHS Experienced Programmer/Developer working to solve everyday problems, Ardent towards AI and Machine Learning, MHHS Basketball Team Player. Hard Working Boy Scout working towards Eagle Rank. Robotics fanatic: Vex Robotics & FTC. Competed in several Hackathons and Won Several Times! Working to create the best Mountain Hacks Yet! Hope to see you there!

name: Charlie Huang
desc: Senior @ MHHS. President of Circuitry Club, Robotics, passionate skier, and outdoor enthusiast. Been to 8 hackathons and love the grind. Organizer in MountainHacks 2023; super excited for 2024!
